sentences.en: As Faldo's final putt rattled in, he qualified to join a select band of illustrious sportsmen.
sentences.cn: 随着福尔多的最后一杆轻击，球应声入洞，他得以跻身门槛颇高的顶级运动员之列。

sentences.en: Ball and hole, which blocks your opponent's putt.
sentences.cn: 球孔, 能够阻止对手的推杆.

sentences.en: Blow - drying replace the old method of putt curler into wet hair.
sentences.cn: 边吹乾边吹发型的方法取代了湿发上卷子的老方法.

sentences.en: Fairway 4:405 yd , par 4, a flat fround fairway , after undergoing the first three undulated fairways, a putt is just demanded now.
sentences.cn: 球道:405码, 标准杆4杆, 平地球道, 经历了前三道的跌宕起伏, 可暂时轻松击球.

sentences.en: He's always putt his foot in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 他 说 话总是笨拙而不得体.

sentences.en: I've got a woman that'll putt roses on my grave.
sentences.cn: 之后有个姑娘,会在我的墓碑上放下一朵玫瑰花.

sentences.en: It's quite a new proposition that you is putt before me.
sentences.cn: 你现在跟我提出的倒是个新建议.

sentences.en: John tried to help the putt fall by using body English.
sentences.cn: 约翰尽量把身体扭向洞口方向以期高尔夫球能落进洞内.

sentences.en: Main Products: electric putt , single - volume ( more ) head screw processing.
sentences.cn: 主营产品: 电动推杆, 批量单 ( 多 ) 头螺杆加工.

sentences.en: Nick Faldo makes an incredible putt from 50 feet, although it's a triple Bogey.
sentences.cn: 尼克·法尔多从50英尺开外打了一记漂亮的轻击入穴.尽管已是超出标准杆3杆.

sentences.en: Oil the tin before putt the dough in.
sentences.cn: 在放入面团以前、先在烤模里抹点油.

sentences.en: She kill the old lady by putt poison in her tea.
sentences.cn: 她在茶里投放了毒药杀害了这位老妇人.

sentences.en: The first is connected with putt thing in order, the second with make preparation in advance.
sentences.cn: 一是把事物按顺序排好, 二是事先作好准备.

sentences.en: The spectators will clap if he makes this birdie putt.
sentences.cn: 如果他能击球入洞,观众会鼓掌致意的.

sentences.en: This putt breaks from right to left.
sentences.cn: 这球入洞的路径会从右到左.

sentences.en: Turner, however, putted superbly, twice holing from 40 feet.
sentences.cn: 然而，特纳两次在40英尺之外漂亮地把球轻击入洞。

words.tran_cn: 投掷；（高尔夫球）打球入洞
放置（put的ing形式）；轻击球；使球入洞的轻击（putt的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: to hit a golf ball lightly a short distance along the ground towards the hole

trans.tran_cn: 把（球）轻轻打进洞里，轻轻一击
